content:
Hi All,
has anyone implemented drug-drug interaction checking using RxNorm and DrugBank or any other public DDI? Could you please advise on how to map RxNorm and DrugBank datasets in order to retrieve DDIs by rxcuis (the same thing as RXNAV Interaction RESTful APIhttps://rxnav.nlm.nih.gov/InteractionAPIs.html#uLink=Interaction_REST_findInteractionsFromList)?
